isReconnection - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Gui
True if it is a reconnection, false if it is a normal game login from the beginning It will be set to false when gameStart is called, which is being called only at the beginning of the match so reconnection will have this boolean to true, to manage some specific GUI case in which you need to ignore first updates after reconnection
